title: Ticket #6552: CPUsUsage and GPUsUsage too long in user log usage report
description:
It's not generally important that the 'Assigned' column not to wrap (example below is at 80 columns), but when it's the fault of bogus precision in the floating-point usage column, it looks really silly. We should limit the usage column to two digits past the decimal point. (This will be annoying because the output code doesn't currently use a numeric representation for the usage column.)
